price: 31.Kaadu Ni-farmoytit (Malayka kinnuk) Nabii Ibraahimih Iscaaqh deqsita baxi yaabaku waah, lakal Iscaaqh baxi Yaq-qhuub yaabaku waamal kaa aytikumusak temeete waqdi, diggah Malayka nanu magaalah mara (Nabii Luut magaalah mara kinnuk) baysenno itte, diggah tet mari daalimiinih sugccnimih sabbatah.
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ بِٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا مُهۡلِكُوٓاْ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِۖ إِنَّ أَهۡلَهَا كَانُواْ ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
